page.title: 14Harraton Dancing Class.
page.content: {Susan McGrath says:- Last{Saturday}when I woke up I got ready and went to the bathroom to get washed and clean my teeth.I woke my brother,went downstairs,got my break- fast and switched on the TV.At 9.00 a.m.I got my coat and my dancing case and went down the church bank and through the tunnel.Past Fatfield School I crossed the road to the {Welfare Hall}and went inside.Pat,my dancing teacher,told me to do my Cha Cha Cha to the Ghost Buster's tune.I had to dance it through twice and then do my Samba twice.Then the older group did their Samba twice and we did my teacher's Samba.I went home at half past eleven, got my dinner and went out to play. After what seemed like only 5 minutes I had to go for tea.At the end of the day I had a bath,got my supper and went to bed.
